itemDescription: Bishop of Southampton; Bishop to HM Prisons; British Anglican bishop (1916-2017)

wikipedia_page.main: John Kingsmill Cavell (4 November 1916 – 19 May 2017) was a British Anglican bishop. From 1972 to 1984, he was the ninth Bishop of Southampton, a suffragan bishop in the Diocese of Winchester.

response: John Cavell was born in Bardwell, Suffolk, the son of  Charles and Sarah Cavell, He married Sarah Elliston of Summertown, Oxford on 9 April 1835, at the age of 22. She was the sister of Jesse Elliston, who owned a draper's shop in central Oxford. Elliston made John Cavell a partner and the shop became known as Elliston & Cavell. This went on to become the largest department store in Oxford.
* John Cavell, Vicar from 1962 to 1972, later Bishop of Southampton

link_mentions.page: Spokesperson bishops in the Church of England

response: * John Cavell was a curate here between 1947 and 1949, he later became Bishop of Southampton
**John Cavell, 100, Anglican prelate, Bishop of Southampton (1972–1984).
*John Cavell, 100, British Anglican prelate, Bishop of Southampton (1972–1984).Tribute to John Cavell
*John Cavell (1813–1887), British department store proprietor and mayor of Oxford, England
*John Cavell (bishop) (1916–2017), British Anglican cleric, Bishop of Southampton
